details: The script uses the VTune Amplifier XE to collect performance data for the "main" executable using the "knc-general-exploration" collection method. It enables VPU and TLB metrics, and saves the results in the "../vtune" directory. The script iterates through different input files (gsm_106857 and kron_g500-logn19) and adjusts the counter variable to control the specific input files used. It appears to be running on a platform with Intel Xeon Phi processors, as indicated by the use of "MIC_LD_LIBRARY_PATH" and "amplxe-cl". The script also utilizes the "module load" command, suggesting it's running on a system using a module system for managing software environments.
